title: Vegetable Dish
description: classical decoration adorns this oval open vegetable dish; claw feet with acanthus and scrolling architectural work; flaring scalloped rim, flower in each scallop spils over the edge into the bowl creating a band of hanging leaves; exterior has a double band near rim, largest band is of garland divided by hanging tassels and flowers, smallest band is of open flowers
creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
